definition: the critical moment/life and death crisis
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: In this life-or-death climax , he showed himself a terrible personality.
sentences.chinese: 在這個生死關頭，他表現出一種令人懼怕的性格。

sentences.english: Water is one of your most urgent needs in a survival situation.
sentences.chinese: 在生死關頭之際，水是您最緊急的需求之一。

sentences.english: A last-minute liver transplant saved his life.
sentences.chinese: 生死關頭的肝移植手術才挽救了他的生命。

sentences.english: Let's go back and look at the three lives that Microsoft has had so far.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們來回顧一下微軟所經歷的三次生死關頭。
